text: Viðar Ari Jónsson (born 10 March 1994) is an Icelandic football right backProfile at WorldFootball, worldfootall.net, who currently plays for Sandefjord. ==Career== Viðar, who began his career with Þróttur and spent 6 years with Fjölnir, signed for Eliteserien club Brann on 6 March 2017. On 18 January 2019, Jónsson signed with Sandefjord for three years.Henter back fra Brann, sandefjordfotball.no, 18 January 2019 ==International career== Viðar has been involved with the U-19 and U-21 teams, and made his senior team debut against Chile at the 2017 China Cup.http://www.ksi.is/landslid/nr/13869 ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |-
